1.title: The Planet of Tons of Dirty Laundry

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: In this Pilot episode Mike & Stuart land on the planet of tons of dirty laundry and face an unexpected foe, one they are ill-equipped to defeat.

2.title: The Planet of Extremely Sticky Floors That Make it Impossible to do Anything

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Mike and Stuart encounter and escape a pair of deadly foes... but then land on a planet where it is impossible to anything, until their favorite beverage comes in handy.

3.title: The Planet of Eventually Exploding Time Bombs of Calamitous Proportions

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: The guys pass through the hack-steroid belt and land on a planet that presents an explosive problem.

4.title: The Planet of Fairly Attractive Women with Terrible Fashion Sense

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: What happens when the guys land of the planet of their dreams?

5.title: The Pizza Man Cometh/The Episode of Mostly Exposition

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: The guys discover how quickly pizza can be delivered in space but must explain their mission to the pizza guy.

6.title: The Wrath of Kalm

episode of.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Mike and Stuart come face to face with their nemesis, the evil Kalm, and they must battle for the lives of Elizabeth and Michelle.

imdb.plot outline: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate! is a sci-fi comedy series with an absurdist, Douglas Adams-esque twist. It follows the adventures of two hapless roommates (Mike and Stuart) who are trapped in their apartment as it's literally hurtling through space at an alarming rate! The confounding thing is that everything works - the power, Internet access, their cell phones, even the plumbing; all the comforts of home are remarkably intact. And the kicker? Friends, family, neighbors, and even the pizza guy can come and go as they please - just not Mike and Stuart. But why, you ask, would the Universe and the laws physics allow for such non-sensical occurrences? Because Mike and Stuart are on a mission. They may not know what that mission is exactly, but they are indeed on one.
imdb.title: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate
akas: Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate (United States)
plot: _Hurtling Through Space at an Alarming Rate_ (qv)! is a sci-fi comedy series with an absurdist, Douglas Adams-esque twist. It follows the adventures of two hapless roommates (Mike and Stuart) who are trapped in their apartment as it's literally hurtling through space at an alarming rate! The confounding thing is that everything works - the power, Internet access, their cell phones, even the plumbing; all the comforts of home are remarkably intact. And the kicker? Friends, family, neighbors, and even the pizza guy can come and go as they please - just not Mike and Stuart. But why, you ask, would the Universe and the laws physics allow for such non-sensical occurrences? Because Mike and Stuart are on a mission. They may not know what that mission is exactly, but they are indeed on one.::Davies Jr., Mike
